data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Levey, B., Bellamy, C. L. (2013): A taxonomic revision of Neobuprestis Kerremans (Coleoptera: Buprestidae) with the description of a new genus and two new species. Zootaxa 3681 (3): 225-240, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3681.3.2
